Documentation

Tutorial

Tutorial provides a quick start to Jolokia. It demonstrates how to deploy a WAR-agent, how to check the installation via a Web browser and demonstrates the client usage with a small sample Java application.

Reference Manual

reference manual contains a comprehensive documentation to Jolokia, its agents and client bindings.

Talks and Screencast

In this section various talks along with slides and some example screencasts are collected. They give short impressions what can be done with Jolokia and its clients.
